mapper.select: SELECT SUM(PROD_QTY)as prod_qty, SUM(GOODSUM_QTY)as good_qty, ROUND(SUM(GOODSUM_QTY) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(PROD_QTY), 0), 1) as per FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND B.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND B.MATERIALID =#{materialid} AND B.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL AND A.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL AND B.SHIFTID LIKE '%AM'

SELECT SUM(PROD_QTY)as prod_qty, SUM(GOODSUM_QTY)as good_qty, ROUND(SUM(GOODSUM_QTY) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(PROD_QTY), 0), 1) as per FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND B.FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND B.MATERIALID =#{materialid} AND B.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL AND A.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL AND B.SHIFTID LIKE '%PM'

SELECT SUM(PROD_QTY)AS TOTALPROD_QTY ,SUM(FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY)AS TOTALFAIL_QTY, ROUND(SUM(FIRSTTIME_FAIL_QTY) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(PROD_QTY), 0), 1) AS PER FROM DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT A JOIN DSP_WORK_CONTENTS B ON A.DATASEQ =B.WORKDAILY_SEQ WHERE A.WORK_DATE =CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND A.FACTORYID =#{factoryid} AND A.MATERIALID =#{materialid} AND A.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL AND B.ISUSABLE IS NOT NULL

SELECT SUM( DATEDIFF(SECOND, CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.WORKTIME_FROM, 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108), CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.WORKTIME_TO, 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108) )) AS UPTIME FROM DSP_WORK_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.LINEID =( SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION dl WHERE 1 = 1 AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC ) AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND A.ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND B.ISUSABLE ='Usable'

SELECT SUM( DATEDIFF(SECOND, CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.NOTOPERATETIME_FROM , 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108), CONVERT(datetime, STUFF(STUFF(A.NOTOPERATETIME_TO, 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':'), 108) )) AS DOWNTIME FROM DSP_NOTOPERATE_CONTENTS A JOIN DSP_WORKDAILY_REPORT B ON A.WORKDAILY_SEQ = B.DATASEQ WHERE B.LINEID =( SELECT TOP 1 LOCATIONID FROM DSP_LOCATION dl WHERE 1 = 1 AND FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y' ORDER BY LOCATIONID DESC )AND B.WORK_DATE = CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATE, #{workDate}),112) AND A.ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND B.ISUSABLE ='Usable'
